page.title: 11School contiued
page.content: After dinner we have P.E.We wear white T shirts, shorts and plimsolls.Then we have another break at 2.05p.m.After break we have art and craft.Usually we draw but sometimes we do needlework. At 3.30p.m.we are dismissed from school. There are after school activities each night: Monday-Netball and Gymnastics Tuesday-Drama for third and fourth years.Wednesday-Orchestra. Thursday-Gym and Drama for first and second years. Friday-Gym,Rounders and Recorders. There are also dinner time groups- Gardening and Recorders. In the classroom we have our work of pictures and drawings.On average there are thirty pupils in each class and about 160 in the whole school.
